Install all the games with the serials listed here & then do all the update patches from above.

Make sure you copy the serial numbers in the nfo posted here.

You will have to enter the Warchiefs serial a second time the first time you play it.

I installed the games using 3 iso's. There is also a GOLD Edition ISO. Both will take the above update patches & then run without a CD. I did not try using the Setup File here although it downloaded just fine.

every time I start it asks for Serial. Also I can not see expansion packs anywhere. other than this, game works fine. any ideas how to fix problem with serial comming up every time?

To everyone asking if you can play online or patch from an online source; the answer is no. The serials are being re-used, and with non original serial keys or a crack program it will not verify the connection and might even require you to re-install the game to play properly. DO NOT TRY TO PLAY OR PATCH FROM THE OFFICIAL SITE! If you want to patch it USE A TORRENT!
